properties.label: Horse Pen Ridge
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, a spur extending NW from Cataloochee Divide; its center is near lat. 35°35'40" N., long. 83°05'07" W.

properties.label: Mouse Creek
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park, rises near lat. 35°42'22" N., long. 83°07'17" W., and flows NW into Big Creek. The name is an Indian one.

properties.label: Panther Spring Gap
properties.description: W Haywood County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park near lat. 35°36'35" N., long. 83°03'50" W.

properties.label: Rattlesnake Knob
properties.description: N Swain County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on the SW end of Long Drive Ridge, lat. 35°33'07" N., long. 83°23'50" W. Alt. 4,311.

properties.label: Sheep Knob
properties.description: NW Swain County in Great Smoky Mountains National Park on Twentymile Ridge near lat. 35°28'50" N., long. 83°49'30" W. Alt. 3,852.
